definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: There was no territorial incursion, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 沒有入侵領土，防衛省說道。

sentences.english: A sovereign state would never allow other countries to violate its own territory.
sentences.chinese: 主權國的領土不容別國勢力侵犯。

sentences.english: The meeting is disrupted by Albanian irredentist.
sentences.chinese: 會議被阿爾巴尼亞的領土收復主義者所中斷。

sentences.english: For instance, the country's territory still needs to be unified and it should be alert about national separatism.
sentences.chinese: 比如其領土還未實現統一，仍然要警惕民族分裂主義。

sentences.english: The aggressive elephants are simply defending their territories, apparently.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，這些大象只是在保衛自己的領土而已。

sentences.english: The territory of the modern Republic of Macedonia became a part of the Province or Banate of Vardar (Vardarska Banovina 1).
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓共和國的領土變成Vardar省的一部分。

sentences.english: Imperium has its territorial basis and non-territorial implications.
sentences.chinese: 帝權以領土爲基礎，同時又有非領土層面的含義。

sentences.english: Imperium has its territorial basis and non-territorial implications.
sentences.chinese: 帝權以領土爲基礎，同時又有非領土層面的含義。

sentences.english: If building a win-win relationship, you can create an environment that solve the territorial issue.
sentences.chinese: 如能構築雙贏關係，則可以爲解決領土問題創造環境。

sentences.english: These dukedoms often fought one another to expand their territories .
sentences.chinese: 這些國家常常爲了擴大自己的領土而互相爭鬥。

sentences.english: Large parts of Britain were under Roman occupation.
sentences.chinese: 不列顛的大部分領土曾被羅馬人佔領。
他們對敵軍領土進行了突襲。

sentences.english: Small kingdom built huge walls aiming at protecting their territories.
sentences.chinese: 諸侯國修起城牆，藉以保護他們的領土。

sentences.english: The provocation this time can be regarded as an invasion of South Korean territory.
sentences.chinese: 李說:“這次挑釁可以被認爲是對韓國領土的侵犯。

sentences.english: Denmark's territory includes the Faeroe Islands and Greenland in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥領土包括北極圈內的法羅羣島和格陵蘭島。

sentences.english: We want the people in the Palestinian Territories to have hope.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望居住在巴勒斯坦領土上的人民獲得希望。

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2
